radiographic_examinations.findings: ICD pulse generator on the left side of the chest, with ICD lead tips projecting over the right atrium and right ventricle, clear and inflated lungs, mild enlargement of the cardiac silhouette, no pleural effusion or pneumothorax
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild enlargement of the cardiac silhouette was stable compared with earlier radiographs

radiographic_examinations.findings: New left pleural effusion, no other clinically significant changes, cardiomediastinal silhouette within normal limits, ICD leads in a position similar to previous radiograph
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: New left pleural effusion observed compared to the previous radiograph

radiographic_examinations.findings: High-density left pleural effusion, ICD lead perforating the pericardium and adjacent fat
